about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 10 years of experience crafting elegant solutions to complex problems. My expertise spans across modern web technologies, cloud infrastructure, and creating user-centric applications. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and delivering products that make a real impact.

responsibilities: Led development of cloud-native applications serving 1M+ users
Architected microservices infrastructure reducing costs by 40%
Built responsive web applications using React and TypeScript
Improved page load times by 60% through optimization
Collaborated with design team to implement pixel-perfect UIs
Developed RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express
